articles.title: HH Global assembles leadership team to establish Nuevo as global creative ecosystem  Jul. 2, 2025 23:30
articles.summary: HH Global launched Nuevo, a global creative ecosystem designed to reimagine brand development and activation across multiple markets and channels. This initiative aims to provide clients with integrated solutions, deeper insights, and strategic excellence. The launch includes the appointment of key leaders such as Trak Ellis-Hill, Dr. Karen Correia da Silva, Richard Buchanan, and Betty Fadier to drive Nuevo's expansion and deliver innovative solutions.

articles.title: I Waited My Whole Life for the Ninja Soft Serve Machine
articles.author: Bryn Gelbart
articles.summary: Ninja launched the CREAMi Swirl, a new ice cream maker that allows users to make soft serve at home. It improves on the original CREAMi with more options, including a soft swirl dispenser. The CREAMi Swirl comes with recipes and is designed for easy use and cleaning.

articles.title: Year-old European startup Maisa named alongside Google and Amazon in elite list of leading AI agent vendors in top global US research reports by Gartner
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Maisa, an AI startup, has been recognized by Gartner for its 'digital workers', hallucination-resistant AI agents designed for complex process automation tasks. Maisa's technology enables businesses to create 'digital workers' for regulatory compliance, supply chain control and financial management. The company's technology is unique as the workings of the AI agents are traceable and there is a fully auditable trail.

articles.title: 35 Must-Have Products You've Been Missing Out On
articles.author: Heather Braga
articles.summary: Several companies are introducing new products. Hawaiian Tropic launched SPF 30 Mineral Powder Sunscreen Brush, Gold Bond launched skin-firming neck and chest cream, and Nivea introduced skin firming gel cream with Q10. Burt's Bees launched After Sun Soother lotion. Monday Haircare released Dry Shampoo with gardenias scent, and Bounce Curl introduced Define EdgeLift Brush. Touchland launched Vanilla Velvet Power Essence Hydrating Body and Hair Fragrance, and McCormick's launched Potato Topping Seasoning.

articles.title: 31 Pleasant, Soothing, Or Cute Products For Good Vibes
articles.author: Rebecca O'Connell
articles.summary: This content introduces many new products like a beginner watercolor kit with impressive pigmentation and packaging, plush Frog and Toad toys, lavender-scented weighted plush, mythical plant stakes, a silly goose badge, a drain cover, and a birria bomb. It also presents a cubic zirconia fidget spinner ring, Nooni tinted appleberry lip oil, a guided journal, Globbles fidget toys, a cutie pie planner, a lavender spray, a tea cup set, peel-off jelly masks, a word search book, and a frog wizard figurine among other new items.

articles.title: Kindle Scribe is on sale for $529 — write, read and think better with Amazon's smartest e-reader
articles.author: Olivia Scott
articles.summary: Amazon has introduced the Kindle Scribe (64 GB), featuring an upgraded Premium Pen and Active Canvas technology for writing directly on books. This device combines immersive reading with digital notebook functionality, allowing users to annotate, sketch, and convert handwritten notes to text. It is now available for a limited time discount price of $529.

articles.title: Samsung Bespoke AI Jet Ultra review: Powerful performance, sleek design and some questionable AI
articles.author: Sonny Loudon
articles.summary: Samsung launched the Bespoke AI Jet Ultra vacuum cleaner priced at $1700. The Jet Ultra features an 'Active Dual Brush,' a Slim LED Brush, a Pet Tool, and a 'Spray Spinning sweeper' mop head. The vacuum includes an All-in-one cleaning station for charging and emptying and incorporates an AI mode for adapting to different floor types.

articles.title: Poposoap's DIY Garden Fountains Offer Backyard Calm Just in Time for Prime Day  Jul. 2, 2025 21:00
articles.summary: Poposoap is offering new solar-powered fountain kits designed for easy setup in various outdoor spaces, ranging from planters to garden ponds. The kits aim to create calming outdoor retreats and support wildlife. The full lineup of these fountain kits will be available at 20% off on Poposoap's Amazon storefront from July 8 to 11.

articles.title: Unilever expands local output
articles.author: Ekathimerini
articles.summary: Unilever will produce its new Skip liquid washing detergent in Greece starting next October. This production entails additional investments in Unilever's Greek facilities and an increase in the company's workforce.

articles.title: McDonald's launching new twist on beloved breakfast menu item
articles.author: Nbc Chicago Staff
articles.summary: McDonald's is introducing the Spicy McMuffin, a new variation of its classic McMuffin breakfast sandwich, at participating locations nationwide starting July 8. The Spicy McMuffin includes McDonald's spicy pepper sauce in addition to the standard McMuffin ingredients. It will be available as an Egg McMuffin, Sausage McMuffin, and Sausage McMuffin with Egg.

articles.title: The best Amazon Fresh deals to shop during Amazon Prime Day Singapore 2025
articles.summary: Amazon Fresh Singapore is offering deals during Amazon Prime Day Singapore 2025 (July 8-14), including discounts on groceries, beverages, and household items. Prime members can enjoy promotions such as up to 50% off on brands like Dettol and Neutrogena, and savings on items from Tiong Lian and Kee Song, along with discounts on specific products like Serve by Hai Sia Batang Steak and 19 Crimes Red Blend.

articles.title: Nude Foods Market offers healthy food, healthy packaging
articles.author: Shelley Widhalm
articles.summary: Nude Foods Market, a zero-waste grocery store, opened a second location in Denver in April 2024, and plans to open three more locations over the next five years. They offer more than 1,800 items, including chef-prepared meals made in-house, all packaged in reusable glass jars.

articles.title: Red, White & Dyson: Score Up to $150 off viral vacuums and air purifiers
articles.author: Ashley Dill
articles.summary: Dyson has launched 4th of July deals, offering discounts of up to $150 on vacuums and air purifiers. The deals include the Gen5detect Cordless Vacuum, Dyson Purifier Big+Quiet, and the V15s Detect Submarine vacuum, each featuring specific technologies and capabilities.

articles.title: New Look's £29.99 'trending' summer dress in six colours
articles.author: Nina Crighton
articles.summary: New Look's "Puff Sleeve Midi Dress", priced at £29.99, is gaining popularity among fashion enthusiasts. The dress features a woven material, relaxed midi fit, a square neckline, short puffed sleeves, and an elasticated waist panel, available in multiple colors and sizes.

articles.title: I Waited My Whole Life for the Ninja Soft Serve Machine
articles.author: Bryn Gelbart
articles.summary: Ninja is introducing the CREAMi Swirl, a new ice cream maker that allows users to make soft serve ice cream at home. The CREAMi Swirl has user friendly assemble requirements and allows to turn every pint container into a soft swirl dispenser. This gadget promises a fun and personalized ice cream experience.

articles.title: Candle Scent Maker: Create Your Own Custom Candles
articles.author: Aaron Hirsch
articles.summary: Bath & Body Works has launched a candle generator service. This service allows customers to design their own candle scents and containers, offering options for classic, chaotic, or entirely new creations. The generator can also surprise users with unique combinations, such as a rainbow-scented candle in a bear-shaped jar.

articles.title: This Citrus Serum Is a Staple In My Routine, Here's Where to Get It
articles.author: Taylor Lane
articles.summary: Origins is promoting its GinZing Glow-Boosting Serum, which is available on Amazon for $49. The serum is highlighted for its citrus scent, glow-boosting properties, and skin-smoothing benefits, attributed to ingredients like vitamin C, caffeine, and hyaluronic acid. User reviews praise its effectiveness in improving skin texture and reducing the appearance of pores.

articles.title: Next's 'cool and classy' £32 summer linen dress that 'doesn't crease'
articles.author: Emily Sleight
articles.summary: Next is offering a 'classy' £32 mini-length dress made from a lightweight linen-blend, featuring a scoop back, side pockets and a split side hem, available in various prints. Marks & Spencer also sells a Linen Rich Round Neck Mini Shift Dress for £29.50 as an alternative.

articles.title: This flattering Next dress is perfect for summer and comes in four colours
articles.author: Megan Martin
articles.summary: Next has launched a new comfortable jersey waisted summer dress available in regular, tall, or petite fit, and in four neutral colors: cream, chocolate brown, navy and olive green. The dress, priced at €54, is available in sizes from 6 to 26 and features a flattering square neckline, waist detailing, and side pockets.

articles.title: 46 Products From Amazon That'll Have You Hitting The "Buy Now" Button *Fast*
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Neutrogena launched Collagen Bank Daily Facial Moisturizer with SPF 30. The Pink Stuff released "Sqeezy" sponge set. Gold Bond introduced firming neck and chest cream.

articles.title: Vodafone continues expansion with new retail opening in Jiwaka
articles.author: Post-Courier
articles.summary: Vodafone PNG has launched a new retail outlet in Banz, Jiwaka Province, offering a range of products and services including smartphones, data plans, mobile accessories, and customer support. This opening enhances accessibility to Vodafone's network and supports the increasing demand for mobile services in the area.

articles.title: Redmi Note 14 Pro 5G: New Colour & Upgrades Explained
articles.summary: The Redmi Note 14 Pro 5G is anticipated to launch with a new Champagne Gold Edition. It is expected to feature upgrades, including a new chipset, improved camera system with a higher-resolution sensor and enhanced OIS, a 120Hz+ refresh rate display, and improvements to battery capacity and charging speeds.

articles.title: Loose Women host's brutal reply to public bidding on Meghan Markle's new move
articles.author: Michelle Marshall
articles.summary: Meghan Markle's brand, As Ever, launched its first wine, a rosé sourced from Napa Valley, California. The wine sold out quickly after its release and is available in batches of three, six, and twelve, with prices ranging from $30 to $300. The brand announced the launch on Instagram, describing the wine as having 'soft notes of stone fruit, gentle minerality, and a lasting finish.'

articles.title: Amazon's No.1 Bestselling Paintsprayer Is Just $38 for a Limited Time, and Shoppers Say It ‘Sprays Paint Fast'
articles.author: John Alexander
articles.summary: Vonforn Paint Sprayer is a product featured in Men's Journal. The product is highlighted for its easy cleanup.

articles.title: Be Early. Be Real. GENIAM by The Genesis Platform Is the Next Big Utility Token Backed by Community Power
articles.author: Sat Articles
articles.summary: Genesis Platform launched the pre-sale of its native token, GENIAM, which provides early supporters access to future Genesis-powered tools, services, voting rights, and exposure to real-world business innovations. GENIAM token serves as a gateway to community opportunity and access to high-value, real-world solutions across industries within the Genesis ecosystem.

articles.title: Samsung sees surge in AI appliance demand across India; aims 70% revenue from smart appliances by year-end
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: Samsung India has launched two new AI-enabled products: a 25 kg Bespoke AI combo washer-dryer and a Bespoke AI Family Hub refrigerator. These launches aim to expand AI technology from Samsung's premium range into the mid-segment, targeting consumers in both metropolitan and tier 2/3 cities, with a focus on energy efficiency and features tailored to Indian conditions.

articles.title: 27 Boden Dresses To Show Off On Your Next Vacation
articles.author: Jessica Hall
articles.summary: Boden is offering a wide range of new dresses, including tie-waist shirtdresses, smocked maxi dresses, and jersey midi dresses, among others. These dresses are available in various sizes, colors, and patterns, with prices ranging from $52.80 to $299, catering to different styles and occasions, such as vacations, picnics, and romantic dinners.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy A55 5G Review: Display & Camera
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy A55 5G in India, targeting the mid-range smartphone market. The device features a 6.6-inch Super AMOLED display with a 120Hz refresh rate, a triple camera system including a 50MP main sensor, and is powered by Samsung's Exynos 1480 processor.

articles.title: New Stuff Alert: Prada Lip Balm and Jonathan Bailey's Sunglasses
articles.author: Rachael Griffiths
articles.summary: Prada has launched a banana-scented lip balm. Left On Friday collaborated with Loeffler Randall for a swimwear collection. Dr. Idriss introduced Disco Block SPF 50. COSRX has launched the Ultra Perfect Hair Bonding Collection. Cubitts collaborated with Johnathon Bailey to launch a limited-edition pair of sunglasses. Bratz collaborated with Jean Paul Gaultier to launch new doll, and Magna-Tile launched new sets.

articles.title: The ‘Best Moisturizer I've Ever Used' Is Less Than $14 At Walmart Right Now
articles.author: Kevin Cortez
articles.summary: Neutrogena's Hydro Boost face moisturizer, a water-based formula with hyaluronic acid, is being offered at a 30% discount at Walmart. Users describe the product as lightweight, non-greasy, and effective for retaining skin moisture, making it a favored daily moisturizer for various skin types.

articles.title: We tried robot vacuum cleaner to see if it saves time and effort
articles.author: Oliver Astley
articles.summary: Ultenic has launched the D10 robot vacuum, available on Amazon for £200.39. The D10 features app-controlled customization, including no-go zones, room-specific vacuum and mop levels, and scheduling. It effectively maps rooms, navigates using a 'Matrix' system, and cleans floors with a spinning side brush.

articles.title: Dyson is taking up to $150 off its popular products during July 4th sale
articles.author: Yzzy Liwanag
articles.summary: Dyson introduces the V11 Extra vacuum, powered by a Hyperdymium digital motor providing 185 Air Watts of suction. It features whole-machine filtration capturing 99.99% of particles and an LCD screen offering real-time feedback on cleaning time and maintenance alerts. The Motorbar cleaner head incorporates a de-tangling mechanism for hair removal.

articles.title: Aldi Scotland takes swipe at M&S by teasing cheeky sandwich for £2.80
articles.author: Lucy Marshall
articles.summary: M&S launched a strawberry and cream sandwich that has been selling out fast. Aldi responded by proposing a parody 'Carrot and Creme Sando' through their social channels, which, if it gets 500K likes, they will make it happen. The hypothetical product is described as carrot and cream nestled in soft, sweetened bread and priced at £2.80.

articles.title: The Seventh Wave: How AI Will Change The Technology Industry
articles.author: Forrester
articles.summary: Microsoft is coupling its cloud and software positions and engaging in partnerships to freeze out newcomers with its Buy and Block strategy. Google is deploying Buy and Link defensive strategies, vacuuming up promising AI advertising startups and offering discounting and packaging deals to extant search customers that want to experiment with the Google AI advertising platform. Amazon will use its hyperdominant retail and cloud position to attempt to aggressively box out challengers and attempt to obsolete itself and lead that revolution.

articles.title: McDonald's to debut new breakfast sandwiches for limited time. Here's when
articles.author: Tanasia Kenney
articles.summary: McDonald's launched a new limited-time breakfast sandwich called the Spicy McMuffin on July 8th. The sandwich is a variation of the Egg McMuffin and features eggs, cheese, Canadian bacon, and McDonald's spicy pepper sauce on a toasted English muffin. The new lineup also includes Spicy Sausage McMuffin and Spicy Sausage McMuffin with Egg.

articles.title: Karcher WD6 P Premium review: wet and dry vacuum for tough cleaning jobs
articles.author: Gareth Butterfield
articles.summary: Karcher launched the WD6 P Premium vacuum cleaner, a heavy-duty appliance designed for wet, dry, and DIY messes. This vacuum features powerful suction, a large 30-liter capacity, a built-in power socket for tools, and a blowing mode, making it suitable for tradespeople, DIY enthusiasts, and car cleaning.

articles.title: Aldi 'launch' rival to M&S's strawberry sandwich and fans are loving it
articles.author: Niamh Kirk
articles.summary: Aldi 'launched' a spoof Carrot and Creme Sando, a parody of M&S's strawberry and cream sandwich. This marketing stunt involves Aldi creating a version of the sandwich and sharing it on social media, aiming for 500,000 likes to potentially make it a real product.

articles.title: Baidu Launches MuseSteamer AI Video Generator, Revamps Search Engine Amid Rising Competition
articles.author: Shubham Verma
articles.summary: Baidu launched MuseSteamer, a new AI-powered image-to-video generator designed for business users, which transforms images into short videos. Simultaneously, Baidu upgraded its flagship search engine by integrating advanced AI capabilities like intelligent search and multimodal input support. The launch and update signify Baidu's effort to reinforce its position in China's AI landscape amidst rising competition.

articles.title: Amazon Prime Day: 8 ways to prepare, according to a shopping editor
articles.author: Sarah Vazquez
articles.summary: Amazon is preparing for Prime Day, a sales event with deals on various products. Customers can find discounts on products like the Amazon Fire TV 65" Omni Series (selling for $450) and the Coway Airmega Purifier (selling for $155). Amazon is also introducing 'Today's Big Deals' featuring brands like Samsung, Kiehl's, and Levi's.

articles.title: Your new Nothing Phone 3 won't ship with Android 16, but a swift Nothing OS 4 upgrade is coming
articles.author: Karandeep Singh Oberoi
articles.summary: Nothing unveiled its new flagship, the Nothing Phone 3, with pre-orders starting July 4 and release on July 15. The device ships with Android 15-based Nothing OS 3.5 and is guaranteed to receive up to 5 major Android upgrades, including Android 16-based Nothing OS 4 in Q3 2025, with updates planned up to Android 20 in 2029.

articles.title: Trump releases new ‘Victory' fragrances
articles.summary: President Donald Trump has launched a new line of fragrances. These fragrances are available through gettrumpfragrances.com.

articles.title: GACB Sathorn Experience Center & GAC Thailand Battery Service Center Officially Open  Jul. 2, 2025 14:17
articles.summary: GAC launched the upgraded global premium compact model, the AION UT, in Thailand. GACB Sathorn Experience Center & GAC Thailand Battery Service Center also opened in Bangkok, Thailand. The opening marks the successful implementation of GAC's "Sales + Energy Services" dual-track strategy in the region.

articles.title: Nothing Phone Price & Release Date
articles.summary: 'Nothing' is launching its next-generation smartphone, the 'Nothing Phone 3', which is expected to feature an enhanced Glyph Matrix, upgraded processor, improved camera, and display technology. The company is also introducing its first headphones, 'Headphone 1', emphasizing acoustic performance, transparent design, and advanced noise cancellation technology.

articles.title: Idomoo Announces Launch of AI Video Ads, Powering Video Advertising at Scale
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Idomoo launched AI Video Ads, a new feature within its Lucas AI Video Creator. This new service is designed for advertisers, enabling them to generate branded, conversion-optimized video ads through a simple prompt.

articles.title: Nuki Debuts in the U.S., Launching Its Innovative Smart Lock to the American Market
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Nuki, a European smart access solutions company, has launched its latest Nuki Smart Lock in the United States. The Smart Lock offers seamless integration, an intuitive app, and a customer-centric design to enhance smart home security for American consumers.

articles.title: Idomoo Announces Launch of AI Video Ads, Powering Video Advertising at Scale
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Idomoo launched AI Video Ads, a new product within their Lucas AI Video Creator, designed for advertisers to instantly generate branded, conversion-optimized video ads from a prompt. The product allows brands to scale video ads with dynamic content, offering features like editable voiceovers and automatic versioning. Lucas AI Video Ads provide enterprises cost savings and allow smaller companies to venture into video advertising.

articles.title: Nuki's Smart Lock is a better retrofit door lock
articles.author: Jennifer Pattison Tuohy
articles.summary: Nuki has launched the Nuki Smart Lock, a retrofit smart lock with a minimalist design, priced at $159. It features Matter support, automatic unlocking, and boasts improved speed and battery life compared to competitors like the August lock. A keypad (Nuki Keypad 2) is also available for $229.

articles.title: Our new products will enhance fabric protection, long-lasting fragrance
articles.author: Blessing Adimabua
articles.summary: Henkel Nigeria has launched WAW Complete 5 in 1 Liquid Detergent and WAW Active 5 All Purpose Cleaner, designed to provide deep cleaning, fabric protection, and long-lasting fragrance. The products are tailored to tackle tough stains and are suitable for various fabrics commonly used in Nigerian households, aiming to provide effective and convenient cleaning solutions.

articles.title: Exclusive Shades & Issues
articles.summary: Samsung Galaxy owners with exclusive color phones like Titanium Jadegreen Galaxy S25 Ultra and Coralred Galaxy S25 and S25 Plus may experience repair delays due to limited availability of color-matched replacement parts.  Authorized service centers struggle to maintain sufficient stock, leading to longer repair times compared to standard color phones.  Samsung has not officially commented on these reported delays.

articles.title: Ocilion Expands Pay-TV with New HD Channels
articles.summary: Ocilion has launched new High-Definition (HD) channel packages for its pay-TV service, providing subscribers with an enriched viewing experience and a greater variety of content. The new packages will include a mix of entertainment, sports, and documentary channels, all broadcast in High Definition.

articles.title: Xiaomi's new EV gets 200000 orders in 3 minutes, cheaper than Tesla Model Y
articles.author: Marty
articles.summary: Xiaomi launched its second electric vehicle, the YU7 SUV, on June 26, 2025. The YU7 offers extended range, a sleek design, and advanced connectivity, and competes with Tesla's Model Y.

articles.title: Aldi rivals M&S viral strawberry sandwich as odd filling divides foodies
articles.author: Lucy Marshall
articles.summary: Marks & Spencer (M&S) launched a new strawberry and cream sandwich in stores on June 25. Aldi, in response, created a mock-up of a carrot and cream sandwich, humorously priced at £2.80, referencing M&S's tagline and potentially hinting at a future product.

articles.title: Honor launches thinnest foldable smartphone with new AI agent amid steep competition
articles.author: Xinmei Shen
articles.summary: Honor launched the Magic V5, a foldable smartphone touted as the 'thinnest and lightest' with built-in AI features, starting at 8,999 yuan (US$1,256). A key feature is Yoyo, an AI agent that can generate presentation decks and coordinate ride-hailing. Honor plans to partner with Alibaba Group Holding to enhance agentic AI capabilities.

articles.title: Mattress Firm's 4th of July sale has up to 70% off Sealy, Nectar, Beautyrest
articles.author: Kyley Warren
articles.summary: Mattress Firm is offering up to 70% off on various mattresses during its 4th of July sale, including Tempur-Pedic and Nectar models. Additionally, shoppers can receive a free adjustable base with select mattress purchases by using the code ELEVATE at checkout. Discounts are available on popular models from brands like Tempur-Pedic, Sealy, Nectar, and Beautyrest.

articles.title: Want a website for your business but unsure where to start?
articles.author: Staff Reporter
articles.summary: HOSTAFRICA has launched its Website Builder, a beginner-friendly platform designed for South African entrepreneurs to create a professional online presence easily and affordably. The Website Builder features a drag-and-drop interface, built-in AI tools, e-commerce capabilities, integrated hosting, and 24/7 local support, allowing users to quickly launch websites with no coding skills required.

articles.title: Baidu responds to Sora and other rivals with MuseSteamer and AI-enhanced search features
articles.summary: Baidu has launched MuseSteamer, an AI-powered video generation tool for business use, featuring Turbo, Pro, and Lite variants. They have also updated their search engine with enhanced AI-driven content curation and integrated voice and image search. Earlier this year, Baidu released Ernie 4.5 and Ernie X1, along with making their AI chatbot, Ernie Bot, free for users.

articles.title: Apple's "NEW" Features... That Android Had YEARS Ago!
articles.summary: Apple unveiled iOS 26 at WWDC 2025, introducing new features.

articles.title: Our 100 most essential, all-time best buys from Amazon
articles.author: Lindsay Schneider
articles.summary: The NBC Select team has compiled a list of 100 essential Amazon buys, highlighting trusted brands and unique finds across major categories. Some products like Clean Skin Club's single-use towels, Round Lab's Birch Juice sunscreen, and Dr. Dennis Gross' self tanner pads were discovered by the staff. The team recommends products for skincare, tech, cleaning, food & beverage, health & wellness, pets, travel, kitchen, fitness, games, leisure, home, hair care, and apparel & jewelry.

articles.title: Holding the ultra-slim Honor Magic V5 made me wonder whether I'd ever go back to a non-folding phone
articles.author: Tom Morgan-Freelander
articles.summary: Honor launched the Magic V5, a new book-style foldable phone in China, featuring a slim design (4.1mm when open) and high-end specifications like the Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset, a triple flagship-grade rear camera setup, and a 5820mAh battery. The Magic V5 introduces advancements in design and features compared to its predecessors, like the Magic V3, and competitors, such as the Oppo Find N5.

articles.title: Galaxy AI Features: Night Mode, Generative Edit & More!
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Samsung introduces 'Galaxy AI,' enhancing mobile experiences through features like real-time translation and generative editing, extending beyond photography to streamline daily routines and international communication. Galaxy AI's enhanced night mode uses sophisticated algorithms to intelligently brighten and clarify images, revealing details previously hidden.

articles.title: 34 Game-Changing Beauty Products You'll Be So Pleased To Tell Your Friends About
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Several beauty and skincare companies are launching new products. Color Wow introduces "Raise The Root" thickening spray. Clinique launches Pop Lip + Cheek Tinted Oil, a version of Black Honey lippie. Gold Bond releases a firming neck and chest cream. Laneige presents Neo Blurring Powder. E.l.f launches Lash XTNDR Tubing Mascara. Olay launches Super Serum Body Wash. Eos introduces Cashmere Vanilla Cashmere Whipped Oil Body Butter. Mario Badescu releases Drying Lotion. Lottabody introduces Coconut Oil Foaming Curl Mousse. Dae introduces Hair Cactus Fruit 3-In-1 Styling Cream & Taming Wand.

articles.title: AdCellerant Enters UK Market, Bringing Scalable Digital Solutions to Agencies and Media Companies
articles.author: Longview News-Journal
articles.summary: AdCellerant is introducing its proprietary marketing platform, Ui.Marketing, to agencies and media companies in the UK. The platform aims to empower these companies through its features.

articles.title: Marshall upgrades its powerful portable speaker with deeper bass and extra refinement
articles.summary: Marshall has launched the Middleton II portable Bluetooth speaker, priced at £259.99 / $329.99 / €299 and available from July 15th. The Middleton II features deeper bass, more refined sound at max volume, and longer battery life (30 hours) compared to the original Middleton. It also has IP67 dust and water resistance, built-in mic, Bluetooth 5.3 with LE audio support and multipoint.

articles.title: Do professional hairstyling at home with Dyson Supersonic R
articles.author: Patrick Villanueva
articles.summary: Dyson has launched the Supersonic R, a new hair dryer designed with professionals in mind. The Supersonic R features a curved design, multiple attachments for different hair types, and the Dyson Hyperdymium Motor for powerful yet controlled drying. It also uses intelligent heat control and RFID sensors to optimize temperature and airflow, ensuring hair safety.

articles.title: Baidu's AI video generator turns your images into 10-second clips
articles.summary: Baidu has launched MuseStreamer, an AI-powered video generator for businesses, offering Turbo, Pro, and Lite versions. Additionally, Baidu revamped its search engine with a redesigned search box, voice and image search support, and AI-driven personalized content.

articles.title: What is Lucking Coffee? Chinese Starbucks competitor opens first stores in THIS US state, offers affordable beverages
articles.author: Shweta Kukreti
articles.summary: Luckin Coffee has launched two stores in Manhattan, New York City, marking its formal entry into the U.S. market and directly competing with Starbucks. To commemorate the launch, Luckin Coffee offered complimentary tote bags to the first 100 customers and is offering drinks for $1.99 through its app for the first beverage order.

articles.title: Amazon is selling a ‘convenient' $219 Nespresso machine for $131, and reviewers say it is 'better than Starbucks'
articles.author: Zoe McDoom
articles.summary: Amazon is offering the Nespresso Vertuo Coffee and Espresso Machine at a 40% discount, reducing the price from $219 to $131. The Nespresso machine is promoted as a user-friendly device that produces delicious single-serving coffee or espresso.

articles.title: Made in Europe.
articles.author: Dominic Preston
articles.summary: Punkt, a Swiss minimalist phone manufacturer, is collaborating with Gigaset, a German company, to launch a line of fully European-built mobile devices. The first device from this collaboration is scheduled to launch in Q4 of this year.

articles.title: DNA's Moi Mobiili launches HeiMobile plan with Heineken to encourage face-to-face sociability
articles.summary: Moi Mobiili, in partnership with Hartwall's Heineken brand, has launched the HeiMobile mobile telephony plan. This plan aims to encourage customers to disconnect from the internet and engage in face-to-face social activities. HeiMobile SIM card users will receive messages promoting sports, culture, leisure, and events.

articles.title: Waitrose expands retail media capabilities to allow offsite advertising
articles.author: Stephen Jones
articles.summary: The John Lewis Partnership (JLP) is expanding its retail media network by offering offsite advertising for the first time. Brands partnering with Waitrose or John Lewis can now run advertising campaigns across connected TV, online platforms, and display ads on other websites, powered by first-party data.

articles.title: New Look's 'gorgeous' dress shoppers are 'immediately falling in love with'
articles.author: Elle May Rice
articles.summary: New Look has introduced the Red Puff Sleeve Midi Dress, priced at £29.99, which is available in multiple colors and sizes. Customers are praising the dress for its style, versatility, and quality, although some have noted sizing issues. The dress features puff sleeves, a square neckline, and an elasticated waist.

articles.title: 'I work at Aldi and this £2.49 item is supermarket's best product'
articles.author: Alice Sjoberg
articles.summary: Aldi has introduced new tiramisu and lemon meringue gelato flavors, priced at £2.49 per tub. An Aldi employee is promoting these products as the 'best ever' find in the supermarket's freezer section. These gelato products are now available for purchase by the customers in Aldi stores.

articles.title: 33 Home Products That Do It Fast, Well, And Cheap
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: The Pink Stuff introduced the "Sqeezy" sponge set and Miracle Multipurpose Cleaner Spray for various cleaning tasks. OXO launched the compact Cold Brew Rapid Brewer that makes cold brew in five minutes.  Additionally, electric potato peeler is introduced which can handle pretty much any peeled produce you throw at it, from apples to kiwis to oranges to tomatoes.

articles.title: Our top picks of Amazon's early Prime Day deals to get shoppers ready for summer
articles.author: Laura Mulley
articles.summary: Amazon is offering early deals ahead of Prime Day, with discounts on products such as the Shark FlexBreeze TableMate Cordless Fan, SMILOVII 24V Cordless Strimmer, Kouric Neck Fans, Russell Hobbs Handheld Clothes Steamer, Expandable Garden Hose Pipe, Apple AirTag, Jugeman Store Smart Watch and Olay Super Serum. These deals provide opportunities for shoppers to save on summer essentials and popular tech items.

articles.title: Ninja Creami on sale at lowest price and helps make 'fun cold summer snacks' easy
articles.author: Eve Rowlands
articles.summary: Ninja is offering its CREAMi Ice Cream and Frozen Dessert Maker at a reduced price of £156 (originally £199.99) on Amazon. The appliance allows users to create and customize homemade frozen treats such as ice cream, gelato, milkshakes, and sorbet with seven pre-set programs. This model stands out with an impressive 4.4 out of 5-star rating from over 1,500 reviews on Amazon.

articles.title: New Look shoppers 'immediately fall in love' with 'beautiful' £27 dress
articles.author: Elle May Rice
articles.summary: New Look has launched the Red Puff Sleeve Midi Dress, priced at £29.99, which features a woven fabric, square neck, short puffed sleeves, and an elasticated waistband. It is available in multiple colors and sizes, receiving overwhelmingly positive online reviews, although some customers have noted sizing concerns.

articles.title: Nothing Headphone 1 review in 10 points: Listen here, this one is worth your attention
articles.summary: Nothing launched the Headphone 1, their first full-size headphone, featuring a unique design inspired by cassette players. The Headphone 1 boasts impressive sound quality tuned in collaboration with KEF, active noise cancellation, and a long battery life of over 40 hours with ANC. It is priced at Rs 19,999.

articles.title: iklipse unveils One-Stop Shop for AI Marketing, Post-Production, and Brand Strategy
articles.author: Evertise
articles.summary: iklipse has launched an integrated hub and a hybrid creative agency that brings together AI-powered content production, post-production services, video editing services, digital advertising, and startup branding solutions. This launch aims to provide a one-stop shop for branding and marketing, offering fast and scalable solutions without sacrificing quality to startups, SMEs, and enterprises.

articles.title: AdCellerant Enters UK Market, Bringing Scalable Digital Solutions to Agencies and Media Companies
articles.author: Ad Cellerant LLC
articles.summary: AdCellerant introduced Ui.Marketing, a proprietary marketing platform, to UK agencies and media companies. This launch signifies the next stage of AdCellerant's international growth strategy, following a successful launch in Canada earlier in 2025.

articles.title: What OpenAI has up its sleeve: An AI gadget mightier than the sword?
articles.author: Parmy Olson
articles.summary: OpenAI, in collaboration with former Apple designer Jonathan Ive, is speculated to be launching a new AI device, potentially a pen. This device is intended to complement smartphones by being aware of the user's surroundings and acting as a 'third device', and is designed to be unobtrusive. The device prototype has captured the imagination of Altman and he believes it will add $1 trillion in value to OpenAI.

articles.title: AI-Boosted Touchpad: Perfect for You
articles.summary: Lenovo has launched the Yoga Tab Plus tablet, featuring integrated AI capabilities and powered by the Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 Hexagon NPU processor. The tablet includes Lenovo AI Now, offering personalized AI assistance, and comes with the Lenovo Tab Pen Pro stylus and a 2-in-1 keyboard pack to enhance productivity and creativity.

articles.title: Google Really Wants You To Try The New AI Mode, Promotes On Homepage Doodle
articles.author: S Aadeetya
articles.summary: Google is launching its new AI Mode for Search to users in the US and India, promoting it prominently on the Google homepage. This new feature is available in the Google Labs section and aims to enhance the search experience with AI-powered overviews and conversational search capabilities.

articles.title: Magis TV & IPTV Bans: Why Restricted in Certain Countries?
articles.author: Marina Collins
articles.summary: The article discusses the evolving landscape of IPTV (Internet Protocol Television), focusing on the challenges posed by illegal services and the increasing enforcement of copyright laws. Legal IPTV providers are adapting to these challenges, and consumers are encouraged to subscribe to reputable streaming services to avoid legal penalties and security risks. Additionally, Plex TV, a streaming service and free IPTV, is expanding its channel offerings, providing users with more diverse content.

articles.title: Summer escapism with Fay Ezzat and Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge
articles.author: Camille Macawili
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy S25 Edge, a new addition to the Galaxy S series. This device combines a slim design with flagship-level performance, featuring mobile AI, a 200MP wide lens, and pro-grade shooting capabilities. It is designed to enhance the mobile photography experience from capturing to editing and sharing.

articles.title: ByteDance's Douyin rolls out Yelp-like AI assistant to suggest eateries, offer reviews
articles.author: Coco Feng
articles.summary: ByteDance launched Tanfan, a chatbot accessible via Douyin that helps users discover meals, book restaurants, and order dishes. Powered by ByteDance's Doubao LLM, Tanfan has registered about 35,000 users and allows users to compare restaurants and watch food video blogs.

articles.title: Simba Hybrid Mattress review after 5 months: support, heat and comfort
articles.author: Head
articles.summary: Simba's Hybrid mattress, along with the Hybrid Pillow and Duvet, provides a comfortable and supportive sleep experience with temperature regulation. The mattress combines Aerocoil® micro springs and cooling technology. The pillow features adjustable Nanocube® filling, and the duvet includes Stratos® temperature control.

articles.title: Another Asian grocery store may be coming to Edison. Here's what we know
articles.author: Suzanne Russell
articles.summary: Asian Fresh of Edison Inc. is seeking approval to open a new Asian Retail Food Market on Route 27 in Edison, New Jersey. The market will occupy 14,478 square feet and include a loading area, refuse storage, and landscaping. The company is seeking variances for front yard setback, building coverage, lot coverage, floor area ratio, building height, and off-street parking.

articles.title: Original Source's AI generated TV ad boosts sales and sentiment
articles.author: Coca-Cola Europacific Partners
articles.summary: PZ Cussons' Original Source brand launched a 37-second TV commercial, with 70% AI-created content, boosting the brand's value sales by 4.5%. The advertisement, which is the brand's first in several years, increased market penetration and aimed to appeal to a younger demographic by contrasting with other washing and bathing brands.

articles.title: Pressure Washing Goes Handheld — Qinux JetPro Max Leads That Direction
articles.summary: Qinux launched Qinux JetPro Max, a multi-functional device priced at $59 (50% off the original price). It boasts features like sleek design, advanced display technology, long battery life, smart connectivity options and enhanced security features. The device is available on the official Qinux website and comes with a money-back guarantee.

articles.title: Robotics will have a ChatGPT moment in the next 2 or 3 years, says Vinod Khosla
articles.summary: Nvidia's CEO, Jensen Huang, highlighted AI and robotics as significant growth areas for the company and indicated autonomous vehicles are a focus. Amazon's CEO, Andy Jassy, stated that robotics represents a growth area for Amazon and will be hiring more people in the AI and robotics area.

articles.title: New supermarket set to open in Hackensack this summer
articles.author: Megan Burrow
articles.summary: Lidl is opening a new store in Hackensack, NJ, on July 25th. The store features a special guest bakery program that introduces a new baked product each month, and the 'Midl of Lidl' aisle offers new items every Monday for a limited time. For the grand opening, special items like a cinnamon raisin New York bagel and a banana nut muffin will be available.

articles.title: Samsung представя нови устройства на 9 юли
articles.author: Снимка: Samsung
articles.summary: Samsung will hold its Galaxy Unpacked 2025 event on July 9, where the company is expected to announce the next generations of Galaxy Z Flip 7 and Galaxy Z Fold 7. The new models are expected to improve upon previous versions with better performance, durability, and optimized screens.

articles.title: Amazon Singapore unveils Prime Day deals, public maze event
articles.author: Amazon Singapore
articles.summary: Amazon Singapore is launching Prime Day 2025 from July 8-14, offering Prime members discounts across various categories like Beauty, Health & Personal Care, PC & Electronics, and Home & Kitchen. The event includes discounts on specific products from brands such as Huggies, Hasbro, FOREO, Anker, Roborock, and Philips, alongside deals on Amazon Fresh and perks like gift card promotions and bank discounts.

articles.title: Swiggy 99 Store Announced: Meals At Rs. 99 With Free Delivery Now Available in 175+ Cities Across India
articles.author: Tasneem Kanchwala
articles.summary: Swiggy has launched '99 Store,' a new service offering single meals priced at Rs. 99, targeting price-conscious consumers in over 175 cities in India. The service features a range of quick-prep dishes with free delivery under the 'Eco Saver' mode, categorized into options like North Indian, South Indian, rolls, and burgers.

articles.title: Aldi Australia wows with new $3.50 buy that tastes JUST like a takeaway 'icon'
articles.author: SHANIA OBRIEN
articles.summary: Aldi has introduced Mini Sesame Milk Rolls, a bakery item priced at $3.49 for a pack of nine, drawing comparisons to KFC's dinner rolls. KFC has launched '31 Days of Deals' via its app, offering daily discounts on menu items. The company is also bringing back its Christmas in July Feast, a special loaded box of festive favorites.

articles.title: GACB Sathorn Experience Center & GAC Thailand Battery Service Center Officially Open
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: GAC launched the upgraded global premium compact model, the AION UT, in Thailand. GACB Sathorn Experience Center & GAC Thailand Battery Service Center was opened in Bangkok, marking the implementation of GAC's "Sales + Energy Services" strategy in Southeast Asia. This includes a new flagship store in Southeast Asia.

articles.title: New Nutella Frenzy Hits Hungry Jack's Nationwide
articles.author: Mirage News
articles.summary: Hungry Jack's has launched a new dessert product called Storm with Nutella, available for a limited time starting July 1, 2025. This product combines Hungry Jack's soft serve with Nutella and wafer crumb, responding to customer feedback.

articles.title: Aldi's viral setting spray is back – it's £27 less than Charlotte Tilbury, leaves your skin glowing & cools you down
articles.author: Henna Sharma
articles.summary: Aldi has relaunched its popular Lacura Setting Spray, available in bronze and champagne hues for £4.49. Additionally, Aldi offers the Lacura Facial Tanning Mist for £2.99 in Day Glimmer and Night Shine versions.

articles.title: Optimus by Tesla: The robot that could change everything
articles.summary: Tesla is developing Optimus, a humanoid robot designed to perform various tasks and address labor shortages. Optimus Gen 3 exhibits advanced balance, mobility and dexterity and is expected to cost around $20,000 with mass production targeted to begin with 1,000 units per month and potential commercial release as early as Q4 2025.

articles.title: Amazon Singapore Unveils a Week of Prime Day Deals and a Special Public Maze Event for Prime Day 2025
articles.author: Amazon Singapore
articles.summary: Amazon Singapore is launching Prime Day 2025 from July 8-14, offering discounts on products from brands like Huggies, Hasbro, FOREO, Anker, Philips, and many more on Amazon.sg. To celebrate, Amazon.sg is also launching the Amazon Prime Day Maze, a free public event, that offers visitors a sneak peek at the incredible deals and new product launches ahead of Amazon Singapore's week-long Prime Day.

articles.title: Motorola Edge 50 Ultra price drop alert: Get 12 GB RAM smartphone at up to Rs. 15,000 discount
articles.author: Anusha Jain
articles.summary: Motorola Edge 50 Ultra has received a price cut on Amazon India, bringing the price down to ₹47,858 from the original ₹59,999. Customers can avail additional discounts of up to ₹2,250 via Yes Bank credit card EMI plans and even more via trade-in offers. The phone features a 6.7-inch curved AMOLED display, Snapdragon 8s Gen 3 chipset, and a versatile triple camera setup.

articles.title: Shamsuddin Jasani, Aatsi Desai Jasani & Gopa Menon launch AI-native marketing firm Theblurr
articles.author: Afaqs
articles.summary: Theblurr, a new AI-native, full-service marketing solutions company, has launched to assist brands by integrating creativity, media, and intelligence. The company's 'HumAIne' approach merges machine intelligence with human intuition for faster, adaptable, and effective marketing solutions. Theblurr aims to unify execution and break down traditional silos to maximize efficiency and achieve business-focused outcomes.

articles.title: Cashygo Sell Old Phone Online In Bangalore Instant Cash
articles.summary: Cashygo offers a complete solution for customers to sell old or used gadgets hassle-free. Cashygo enables customers to sell old gadgets online and receive instant cash with free home pickup. Cashygo aims to provide convenient and secure solutions for selling old gadgets online.

articles.title: VCs Are Turning Away From The ‘fixer-Upper' Founder
articles.author: Check Warner MBE
articles.summary: Flexa provides a platform for accessing transparent information on working environments. Patchwork Health offers digital workforce management tools for healthcare staffing. Valla provides an AI-powered legal tech platform that democratizes access to legal advice, while Orbital streamlines property due diligence using machine learning and AI.

articles.title: Karcher WD6 P Premium review: A powerful wet and dry vacuum for serious cleaning
articles.author: Gareth Butterfield
articles.summary: Karcher has launched the WD6 P Premium, a heavy-duty wet and dry vacuum cleaner designed for tradespeople, DIY enthusiasts, and car-cleaning fanatics. The WD6 P Premium features a 30-liter chamber, a built-in power socket for power tools with an auto-on mode, and a blowing mode for cleaning. Currently, Amazon offers the Karcher WD6 P Premium at a discounted price of £209.99.

articles.title: 490 கிமீ ரேஞ்சுடன் வெளியாகும் கியா கேரன்ஸ் கிளாவிஸ் EV
articles.summary: Kia has released a new teaser and revealed new details about its upcoming Kia Carens Clavis Ev model.

articles.title: Shamsuddin Jasani, Aatsi Desai Jasani, and Gopa Menon launch Theblurr
articles.author: Bestmediainfo Bureau
articles.summary: Shamsuddin Jasani, Aatsi Desai Jasani, and Gopa Kumar Menon launched Theblurr, a full-service marketing solutions company. Theblurr aims to integrate creativity, media, data, and strategy through its proprietary 'HumAIne' approach. The company offers full-funnel marketing capabilities driven by AI-first thinking.

articles.title: How Nothing Bets The Farm On A Rs 80,000 Phone With Sheer Audacity
articles.author: Sahil Mohan Gupta
articles.summary: Nothing has launched the Nothing Phone (3), priced at Rs 79,999, aiming to compete in the premium smartphone market with a focus on software and design.  Additionally, Nothing introduced the Headphone (1) at Rs 21,999, featuring KEF-tuned audio technology, positioning it as a value-driven alternative to established brands like Sony and Apple. The company is also touting the success of Nothing Phone (3a) Pro which was launched earlier this year.

articles.title: Shamsuddin Jasani, Aatsi Desai Jasani and Gopa Menon launch Theblurr
articles.author: BE Staff
articles.summary: Theblurr, an AI-native full-service marketing solutions company, has launched. Founded by Shamsuddin Jasani, Aatsi Desai Jasani, and Gopa Kumar Menon, Theblurr aims to provide measurable business outcomes by integrating creativity, media, data, and strategy, using its proprietary 'HumAIne' approach.

articles.title: Hong Kong's Revolutionary Sauce EXOTICA UMAMI [EX M] Stuns Industry Professionals with Its Instant Boost to Flavour, Texture, and Seasoning
articles.author: Exotica Food Concepts
articles.summary: EXOTICA UMAMI (EX M), a multifunctional cooking sauce, was launched at a tasting event at the JW Marriott Hotel Hong Kong. The sauce, created as a modern alternative to salt, soy sauce, and MSG, enhances flavor, tenderizes meat, and has been adopted by chefs. New World Millennium Hotel will launch Exotica Umami Slow Cooked Salmon and [EX M] Char Siew in their restaurants starting July 1.

articles.title: Popur S7 Split Litter System (SLS) Launches on Kickstarter.com
articles.author: Popur International Limited
articles.summary: Popur launched the Popur S7 Split Litter System on Kickstarter. The robo-litter system features a convertible litter tray and exterior waste bin, designed for cleaner homes and happier cats. It uses Popur's Split Litter System (SLS) technology to keep the litter area clean and the air fresh.

articles.title: 'I didn't expect to have big feelings about a car... Then I met this one.'
articles.author: Kelly Mccarren
articles.summary: The MINI Countryman introduces new features like self-parking, an OLED display with Apple CarPlay and Android Auto, and wireless charging. It also offers customizable driving modes such as Green Mode and Go-Kart Mode, enhancing the driving experience. The car boasts a family-friendly design with spacious interior and customizable exterior options.

articles.title: 10 Things We've Tried And Loved This Month July '25
articles.author: Daniel Boan
articles.summary: Sol de Janeiro launched Body Badalada lotion, featuring the Bum Bum Cream scent in a lighter, summer-friendly formula with seven forms of hyaluronic acid. Tubby Todd introduced a new micellar water, a no-rinse cleanser for quick baby refreshes. L'Oréal released a Lip Plump, a creamy and hydrating product that provides a subtle plumping effect.

articles.title: Nothing Phone 3 launched in India: Top specs, key features, price in India, and everything else
articles.author: India Today
articles.summary: Nothing Phone has launched its new phone in India. The launch includes information about the phone's top specifications, key features, and price in India.

articles.title: Android users can now edit messages sent to iPhones via Google Messages
articles.author: Indian Express
articles.summary: Google is currently testing a new feature. This indicates a potential introduction or update to an existing product or service.

articles.title: OnePlus Nord 5 Series Launch: Premium Look, Bigger Battery, Price And Key Details
articles.author: NDTV
articles.summary: OnePlus will launch its Nord 5 series, featuring the Nord 5 and Nord CE 5 models, on July 8th at 2:00 p.m. IST.

articles.title: Aldi Australia wows with new $3.50 buy that tastes JUST like a takeaway 'icon'
articles.author: The Daily Mail
articles.summary: Aldi introduced Mini Sesame Milk Rolls, a bakery item priced at $3.49 for nine. Shoppers claim the rolls taste similar to KFC's iconic dinner roll.

articles.title: SAP Launches New Cloud-Based Point-of-Sale Solution (SAP SE)
articles.author: Public Technologies
articles.summary: SAP launched a new cloud edition of SAP Customer Checkout. This edition provides customers with a seamless, efficient, and scalable point-of-sale (POS) solution.

articles.title: Xiaomi Brings Redmi Note 14 Pro And 14 Pro+ In New Gold Colour In India: ...
articles.author: News18
articles.summary: Redmi Note 14 Pro and 14 Pro+ are now available in a new color variant. These models feature the same hardware but are offered with a new price tag.

articles.title: Nothing Phone 3 release date and pre-order details as new model 'outperforms' previous phone
articles.author: Daily Record
articles.summary: Nothing launched its latest flagship phone. The new phone is claimed to be stronger and faster than the Nothing Phone 2.

articles.title: Don't chance waiting on Prime Day for a DualSense Edge deal – EE Store has ...
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: EE Store is offering a substantial discount on the DualSense Edge controller.

articles.title: GRAMMY-Winning Producer DJ Mustard Drops Sweet Chipotle Heinz Collab
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: DJ Mustard introduced Heinz Mustaaaaaard, a limited-edition smoky-sweet chipotle honey sauce. This launch marks Heinz's first new mustard product in 10 years.

articles.title: Dyson announces latest Airwrap styler that's faster and lighter than older models
articles.author: Daily Record
articles.summary: Dyson is preparing to release its latest Airwrap styler, touted as the 'most advanced' version to date. This indicates a forthcoming launch of an updated or new product within their hair care line.

articles.title: ClassNK grants Innovation Endorsement for Products & Solutions to ‘CMAXS LC-A' developed by MITSUI E&S ...
articles.author: system
articles.summary: ClassNK has granted Innovation Endorsement to CMAXS LC-A. CMAXS LC-A is an engine monitoring system and service.

articles.title: This budget Motorola phone punches way above its weight (and it comes with a stylus)
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: Motorola's Moto G Stylus 2025 features a snappy chipset and a brilliant AMOLED screen, delivering high performance despite its midrange price point. This new device offers a compelling user experience through its enhanced hardware.

articles.title: Tesco's 'flattering' �19.50 mini dress is 'perfect for beach clubs'
articles.author: Daily Record
articles.summary: Tesco's F&F Clothing is selling a new dress which has been described as 'stunning' and 'gorgeous' by fans.

articles.title: TWSE Launches New tib Brand Film: Sparking a National Innovation Dialogue Through Animation to Discover the Next Unicorn (TWSE - Taiwan Stock Exchange Corporation)
articles.author: Public Technologies
articles.summary: The Taiwan Stock Exchange (TWSE) has launched a new 'tib' brand film. The film uses animation to spark a national innovation dialogue.

articles.title: China's Honor launches new challenge to Samsung with thin foldable smartphone and a big battery
articles.author: system
articles.summary: Honor launched the Magic V5, a new foldable smartphone. The initial launch will be in China, followed by overseas markets.

articles.title: Sky launch six new channels today as users urged to check TV guide
articles.author: Daily Record
articles.summary: Sky is offering its users access to six new channels at no cost. This provides Sky users with access to brand new channels without additional charges.
